hero.headline: Turn everyday into payday.
hero.sub-copy: Earn up to 15% cashback at thousands of retailers, like CVS, Buffalo Wild Wings and Chevron.^^

cash-back-irl.headline: Get up to 15% cashback, in-store or online.
cash-back-irl.body: We won’t box you into a single way of spending. You’ll get cashback when you shop online and in person. It’s your money, so spend it how you like.

shop-local.headline: All the more reason to shop local.
shop-local.body: Your Tend card gets you cashback at tons of local retailers—some even offer more than 15%. Supporting your community feels even better when you get cashback for it.

perks.headline: Find a deal
perks.body: You can always see the deals available near you in your Tend app.

perks.headline: Activate your deal
perks.body: Let us know when you’re interested in a deal, and we’ll make sure you get it.

perks.headline: Go bananas
perks.body: Use your Tend card when you check out, and we’ll apply the deal automatically.

perks.headline: Get paid
perks.body: We’ll deposit your cashback into your account in 30 – 90 days.
